about_the_game:
Start your epic adventure as King of heaven beings. Order Cherubims to gather resources and build your town. Create an army of Angels and Archangels for conquering the world. Collect new powerful artifacts with unique abilities.

This DLC contains the following:
  • Alternative start in campaign mode as King of Angels
  • Alternative start in sandbox mode as King of Angels
  • New angel unit Cherubim — worker type that can effectively build and gather resources
  • New building Ophanim — angel tower that has high damage and attack rate
  • New building Angel's Temple — it allows creating Angels and Archangels. In addition, it has the ability to transmute wood and food into gold
  • 4 new powerful artifacts

  • New character for player 2 — Heaven Queen
  • Upgrading king's boots also improves jumping

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer. (32x or 64x)
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Start your epic adventure as King of heaven beings. Order Cherubims to gather resources and build your town. Create an army of Angels and Archangels for conquering the world. Collect new powerful artifacts with unique abilities.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Greek, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Korean, Polish, Swedish
